paper.title: Response to Refutation of Aslam's Proof that NP = P

chunks.label: Abstract
covers: Refinement of previous response; new structures for counting VMPs with common ER

chunks.label: Section 1: ER Satisfiability and Enumeration
covers: MinSet Sequences overview; two-step generation process; CVMPSet partition

chunks.label: Section 2: Key Concepts
covers: Stabilizer chains; Sn to PM mapping; generating graph Γ(n); VMPs/CVMPs; MDAG

chunks.label: Section 2.3: The Partition
covers: Edge Requirements; MinSets; VMPs of common ER; CVMPSet structure; generating set GMS

chunks.label: Section 2.4: The Counting Algorithm
covers: Algorithm 2.1; polynomial time bound O(n^45 log n); correctness lemma

chunks.label: Section 3: Counter-example Re-visited
covers: Concrete example with Γ(9); MinSet visualization; corrected evaluation
